DataElement.preferredName: Menstrual Cycle Within 6 Month Diagnosis Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating whether a person's menstrual cycle has occurred within 6 months of their cancer diagnosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Menstrual Cycle Within 6 Month Diagnosis Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The Menstrual Cycle involves regularly recurring hormonal changes and physiologic endometrial changes during the reproductive period in human females, and some primates, and culminates in partial sloughing of the endometrium (menstruation) in the absence of fertilization. For most women, one cycle takes 28 days. (NCI)_On the inside; contained in._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::6_One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Regularly recurring physiologic changes in the endometrium during the reproductive period in human females, and some primates, and culminating in partial sloughing of the endometrium (menstruation) in the absence of fertilization. The hormonal changes that lead up to a woman's having a period. For most women, one cycle takes 28 days.

Concepts.definition: The Menstrual Cycle involves regularly recurring hormonal changes and physiologic endometrial changes during the reproductive period in human females, and some primates, and culminates in partial sloughing of the endometrium (menstruation) in the absence of fertilization. For most women, one cycle takes 28 days. (NCI)

Property.preferredDefinition: On the inside; contained in.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::6:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the patient's ability to conceive or nurse offspring and/or their current reproductive status.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: 10.12.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED WITHDRAWN to RETIRED ARCHIVED in preparation of OneData. Retire this VM, it is a duplicate.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
